channel_name.Description: fNIRS channel identifier (source-detector pair with wavelength)

sci.Description: Scalp Coupling Index - correlation between wavelengths in cardiac band (Pollonini et al., 2016)

saturation_percent.Description: Percentage of samples exceeding 95% of ADC range

cardiac_power.Description: Peak Spectral Power in cardiac band (0.5-2.5 Hz) - PHOEBE framework

cv.Description: Coefficient of Variation in baseline periods - (std/mean)*100

is_bad.Description: Channel marked as bad based on quality thresholds

reason.Description: Reason(s) for marking channel as bad (if applicable)
